$uid..validate:
newData.hasChildren(['nickname','isAnonymous','joinedAt']) &&

              newData.child('nickname').isString() &&
              newData.child('nickname').val().length <= 50 &&

              newData.child('isAnonymous').isBoolean() &&

              (
                newData.child('joinedAt').isNumber() ||
                newData.child('joinedAt').child('.sv').val() === 'timestamp'
              ) &&
              (
                !newData.hasChild('photoURL') ||
                newData.child('photoURL').isString() ||
                newData.child('photoURL').val() === null
              ) &&
              newData.getPriority() === newData.getPriority()
